docs.snippet: Jeff Francoeur and Jason Lane, veterans on the Class AAA El Paso Chihuahuas, see pitching as a way to return to the major leagues....
docs.lead_paragraph: Jeff Francoeur and Jason Lane, veterans on the Class AAA El Paso Chihuahuas, see pitching as a way to return to the major leagues.
docs.abstract: Former major league outfielders Jeff Francoeur and Jason Lane, both veterans in their 30s, have found a second act playing for Class AAA El Paso Chihuahuas, filling in as pitchers; are hoping their new careers on the mound could bring about a return to the majors.

headline.seo: Jeff Francoeur and Jason Lane Look for a Way Back to the Major Leagues
headline.main: Pitching for Fun, and for a Future
